[![GitHub Release](https://img.shields.io/github/release/moroshka-dev/moroshka-type-analyzer.svg?style=flat&color=success)](https://github.com/moroshka-dev/moroshka-type-analyzer/releases)
[![openupm](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/com.moroshka.type-analyzer?label=openupm&registry_uri=https://package.openupm.com&?style=flat&color=success)](https://openupm.com/packages/com.moroshka.type-analyzer/)

![Coverage](https://img.shields.io/endpoint?url=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/moroshka-dev/moroshka-type-analyzer/main/.github/badges/coverage.json)

`TypeAnalyzer` is a tool for analyzing type structures. It provides the ability to extract information about constructors, methods, properties, and fields of a given type. This tool is useful when working with reflection, where you need to dynamically examine types at runtime.
